cloudConfigResults.title: Reducing the admission of containers with dropped capabilities
cloudConfigResults.description: The requiredDropCapabilities property (as part of the Pod Security Policy) provides a whitelist of capabilities that must be dropped from containers (https://docs.docker.com/engine/reference/run/#runtime-privilege-and-linux-capabilities). These capabilities are removed from the default set, and must not be added. It’s recommended to drop all the capabilities (using ALL), or at least to drop NET_RAW (which allows a process to spy on packets on its network / to inject data onto the network).
